summary:
REQUIRES APACHII SKYHAIR.
This Is a small overhaul for Mjoll (Pronounced ME-YOL) which makes her look like all that bit better.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES APACHII SKYHAIR.
This Is a small overhaul for Mjoll (Pronounced ME-YOL) which makes her look like all that bit better.

She has had her wound repaired, her war paint removed, longer hair and a slightly buffed sneak skill (After living in Riften, surely she would know more sneak than just 20!)

This is a first mod of mine, so... It does use many other people\'s ideas, this is primarily a bugfix of the \"Mjol\" mod from B52, as the mod appeared to contain some \"Foreign characters\" (letters from another language that are not recognized by the GameBryo engine, which cause bugs.)

RECOMMENDED MODS FOR BETTER LOOKING FEMALES:
Apachii Skyhair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
RAN\'s Type - D headmesh - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127
UNP Female body (NSFW) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
ADD HD MAPS FOR LARGER MONITORS
\"Envision\" face for UNP - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
author: OmalleyPike
